title: Pull request template
descriptionFull: This repository includes a text file that serves as a template in github repositories, to pre-populate the first comment of any PR with content.
The template contains categories such as Title, Owners, Summary, Challenges, References, UI, and Checklists.

title: Node API - 2
descriptionShort: Serving static pages and images with Node and Express.
descriptionFull: This project is a build of an API configured to serve static html pages, provide routes, and render views.
Express helper methods are used for routing and Express-Handlebars enables a view engine.
The design is inspired by content from Ch. 3 of Web Development with Node & Express by Ethan Brown, 2nd ed.

title: Node API - 1
descriptionShort: Serving static text and images with Node.
descriptionFull: This project is a build of an API configured to serve static html pages and provide routes.
The design is inspired by content from Ch. 2 of Web Development with Node & Express by Ethan Brown, 2nd ed.

title: Playdate
descriptionFull: The Playdate application is a WIP inspired by real-world challenges faced by parents with young children.
The MVP of this SaaS, co-developed with Daria Lykova, is to develop a dashboard that helps connect parents whose children attend the same schools to coordinate friendship and shared childcare.

title: BMI Calculator JS
descriptionFull: The body mass 'index' is a scaled ratio of a person's height and weight.  This widget application performs calculations that produce a BMI value with Metric or Imperial units.

title: FizzBuzz
descriptionFull: The FizzBuzz coding challenge has historically been a 'litmus test' for basic scripting acumen.  The requirement is simple: write a program that iterates through positive integers, and return Fizz if divisible by 3, Buzz if divisible by 5, and FizzBuzz if divisible by 15.

title: Library Manager
descriptionShort: Managing a library collection with search function.
descriptionFull: The Library Manager has been developed to simulate the library system functionality that would be desired by a librarian, a library admin, and a library member, such as book checkout, book search, and book availability.

title: ATM Simulator
descriptionShort: Simulating ATM interactions with bank account member.
descriptionFull: The ATM Simulator has been developed to simulate the functionality of a bank member using an ATM, including account verification, and funds deposit and withdrawl.
